result.reason: SQL NOT NULL constraint violation on 'RedirectAudioCapture' when saving a new folder — DataTableSerializer omits default values for RDP-specific columns on ContainerInfo nodes.
result.approach: In SerializeConnectionInfo(), ensure all NOT NULL columns (RedirectAudioCapture and similar RDP boolean columns) receive a default value (false/empty string) when the node is a ContainerInfo, either via DBNull.Value handling in CreateSchema() or by explicitly setting defaults before INSERT.

attempts.raw_output:
The error is clearly identified in comment from `thornt5748`:
> `Cannot insert the value NULL into column 'RedirectAudioCapture', table 'mRemoteNG.dbo.tblCons'; column does not allow nulls.`

The `DataTableSerializer` fails to provide a default value for `RedirectAudioCapture` (and likely other RDP-specific boolean columns) when serializing a container/folder node.

```json
{"decision":"implement","reason":"SQL NOT NULL constraint violation on 'RedirectAudioCapture' when saving a new folder — DataTableSerializer omits default values for RDP-specific columns on ContainerInfo nodes.","priority":"P2-bug","estimated_files":["mRemoteNG/Config/Serializers/ConnectionSerializers/Sql/DataTableSerializer.cs"],"approach":"In SerializeConnectionInfo(), ensure all NOT NULL columns (RedirectAudioCapture and similar RDP boolean columns) receive a default value (false/empty string) when the node is a ContainerInfo, either via DBNull.Value handling in CreateSchema() or by explicitly setting defaults before INSERT."}
```
